definition: neuron/also written 神經元|神经元
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The CAA was often accompanied with the senile plaques and neurofibrillary tangles.
sentences.chinese: CAA往往同時伴有老年斑和神經原纖維纏結。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and surgical procedure selection of ileoceca diverticulitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討神經原性膀胱手術方式選擇與術後併發症。

sentences.english: SLE patients have different anti-CNS antibody profile of their own.
sentences.chinese: SLE患者可有不同的抗神經原抗體譜。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a canine model of neurogenic bladder and to evaluate it with urodynamics.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立犬神經原性膀胱模型，進行尿動力學評價。

sentences.english: It is formed by the coalescence of the first three neuromeres in the embryo.
sentences.chinese: 它是由胚胎時的前三個神經原節癒合而成的。
